ygData.subject: Re: Yellow?!?
ygData.msgSnippet: Mithril armor is also a pale blue, and there s starting to be ALOT more people in Mithril popping up these days. ... From: John Robertson  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Mithril armor is also a pale blue, and there's starting to be ALOT more
people in Mithril popping up these days.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 29, 1999 1:39 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Yellow?!?


>From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>
>
>

>>

through a
